name: Explore Codebase Structure
description: Understand how a codebase or feature area is organized
content:
I need to understand the structure and organization of {{area}}.

Please:
1. Map out the directory structure and key files
2. Identify the main entry points and how data flows
3. Document the relationships between components/modules
4. Note any patterns or conventions being followed
5. Highlight any areas that seem unusual or could be improved

{{context}}

variables.name: area
variables.label: Area to Explore
variables.placeholder: e.g., authentication system, API layer, src/features/checkout

variables.name: context
variables.label: Additional Context
variables.placeholder: What specifically are you trying to learn? Any particular concerns?
